Rodimus:

rodimus looke his beloved and with low voice he said "I'd do 
whatever I can to bring ya back... I promised you."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> Dracos:
>  
> Nods with a understanding gesture. " I see, Never once have I seen 
such affection towards one another like you have jsut shown, Me I am 
just a surviver, Of what I am not sure. But we can talk after I get 
Reoaired."
>  
> After saying that to rodimus Dracos looks for an open chamber and 
then begins his repair cycle.
> 
> Airly <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Roidmus:
>  
> Rodimus was supriced, he belived that he was alone. After a short 
while he said with sadness and while he touched with love the pod's 
door "She's Nighlight... my wife"
> ----- Original Message ----- 
> From: Jerame Johnson 
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

> Subject: Re: Regeneration
> 
> 
> Dracos:
>  
> Looking into the glass to see nightlight, then turns his head 
towards rodimus and asks "who is that in the chamber?"
